website_summaries.verdict: Get the best of both worlds with a flexible, portable raclette that can still feed large groups.
pros: A non-stick reversible flat top with flat and grill sides allows you to cook a variety of foods quickly with little mess
The granite stone heats more slowly, for even searing
Comes with 8 wooden spatulas for group sharing
Grill top and raclette pans are dishwasher safe
cons: Some users have criticized its power output, saying it heats too slowly

customer_reviews.title: This is the best Raclette set I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Raclette set I've ever bought, the quality is absolutely excellent and having the option to switch the top grill between regular PTFE (non-adhesive) coated aluminum and marble makes this a perfect combo. Also having the possibility to use 8 trays at the same time makes it very unique. I am highly recommending this item over all the other options
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan D.

customer_reviews.title: Fun for group parties.
customer_reviews.text: The grill has been fun for group parties. I suggest heating the granite up in the oven before use - it takes a long time to heat up. It has been easy to clean up but you do need to be EXTRA gentle with the non-stick surface of the pans. I've had it come off of one of them already.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this grill
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier with this grill. I used the granite cooking stone and it heated evenly and I couldn’t believe how easy it was to clean after it cooled down. It holds heats evenly and hold heat for a surprisingly long time. The cheese drawers also were very easy to clean. We used it in the middle of the table with a group of 12 people and everyone enjoyed the experience and using the grill to customize their meals.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Albertson

customer_reviews.title: Great times!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great social eating thing! Some minor pointers: Make sure that you plug it in a let it warm up; it takes a while to get to cooking temp. Try different cheeses; some melt more quickly than others; thinner slices are better.....obvs! This was a bday pressie for my wife and it was a resounding success!! Great times!! So why not 5 stars?? The power lead is woefully short......like only 3-4 ft.....so we had to use the extension cable from the workshop....not pretty but functional!!
customer_reviews.author: Smiffy

customer_reviews.title: Multipurpose appliance. Everyone loves Raclette!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two as gifts. Two others have purchased for themselves after a raclette meal! Am of Swiss heritage and had this type of meal in our “hometown” of Adelboden. Can be used for grilling and toasting many foods. Even cook your eggs and toast for breakfast. I live in a small town so raclette cheese is not available but purchased both Swiss and French raclette from Amazon and both were great.
customer_reviews.author: consumer

customer_reviews.title: Wooden Spatulas aren't great
customer_reviews.text: I love raclette and cooking on this was easy. The only problem was that the wooden spatulas were fibrous and you can get a splinter. I haven't used the marble top yet, it's very heavy. The cord is short so you'll need an extension cord if your table isn't close to the outlet. Love the color coded little pans so you don't eat off someone else. The cheese cooks perfectly in those pans and easily slides out! Overall, this was a great purchase, just wish the wooden spatulas were better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Acey S.

customer_reviews.title: Fun for Family
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this to a family that has everything, but enjoys cooking & entertaining. They loved it. The have enjoyed using it as a family and for parties. We were invited to use it one evening and I thought it was really neat. We had a party of 7 and I think it was just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Not hot enough
customer_reviews.text: Comparing to other famous brand, it does not get hot enough. Do not recommend it. If you willing to pay a lit bit more, go for another brand. That's my honest review.
customer_reviews.author: P.Chung

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grill for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This grill is a great one! It has a temperature control and heats up hot enough to cook everything we've tried. The clean up on the smooth grill side is super easy! I did a ton of research on raclette grills and this one was consistently in the top 2 on best raclette grill lists. I ordered one that was used and it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Howk

customer_reviews.title: Bad raclette! Dont buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my raclette with different company and brand 3 years ago and i bought this raclette in august for my newlywed son and his wife . The first time we ve used it tonight, on new year's eve. We were very disappointed!! It takes for ever to grill!! Mine is much stronger and faster and i paid less. Unfortunally, i cant return it anymore, the return policy is only for a montg and we just open the box after 2 month!!! Not satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Caline

customer_reviews.title: Great meal !
customer_reviews.text: We had our family and friends over before a concert and decided on this meal. A great success and everyone loved this style of eating. The device was quick to heat up and melt the cheeses while the food warmed on the griddle/stone. Since Raclette cheese was not available, we went to our cheese store and substituted with gruyere. A fun meal and great product!
customer_reviews.author: jm

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The plastic body of the grill is cheap and flimsy. The non-stick surface has scratches after the first use despite exceedingly careful use. Regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Lars

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Family fun
customer_reviews.text: Loves this raclette as we were looking to replace our old one oh, this most certainly got the job done. Very easy to clean and adjustable temperature. The family had a blast using it and have been using it at least once or twice a week since purchase with no problems. If you're on the fence about getting it I definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Roxie

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this raclette grill to use it for the Holidays and regret! It took too long for it to heat up/cheese to melt. It’s possible mine came defective since the box was destroyed right corners , also stone plate came damaged both right corners.
customer_reviews.author: USLOESJE

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: My new raclette grill is such a great addition to the kitchen. I had a raclette party the very night that it arrived. There were 7 people at our house for a very fun and relaxing time. All our guests are still talking about the great time we had and the yummy food, and asking for another get together with the new raclette.
customer_reviews.author: E. Fenton

customer_reviews.title: Make family dinner great again!
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this raclette! We all cook what we want and just sit and talk! We’ve cooked steak, burgers, chicken strips, shrimp and nearly every vegetable imaginable! Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: B. Gill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good one. If you need to melt cheese faster, plan to order little bit more powerful (by wattage) model
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great for Family Fun Dinners!
customer_reviews.text: My family and I used this the same day we received it. We used it for our family Korean BBQ night. The kids had a blast cooking their meal on it. We cooked thinly sliced brisket meat and pork belly meat. Can’t wait to cook other meals on it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Gifted these to parents. They loved it. We had people over for a raclette dinner. You need to know what cheeses work best for this. Some cheeses melt better than others. Besides that cleans easily. Easy to use. Guests love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: We returned this item because it was defective. The nonstick coating was beginning to peel off
customer_reviews.author: Martina Lydon

customer_reviews.title: Lots od fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after going to a restaurant and paying $156.00 for a Raclette dinner of two. Purchased this Raclette and we had the same dinner for four and the food cost $26 was just as fun and we can do it again anytime.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin HAyward

customer_reviews.title: Great for Families!!
customer_reviews.text: This was so much fun! We used it for our New Year's dinner & had a blast. Our family ages range from 11 to 50 and each one enjoyed it. The youngest two were not sure about it, but they loved it & have asked to do it again soon. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl S.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love I use it alot. I make egg muffins love that I can use the little pans for the eggs. Very easy to clean heats up quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Lore M

customer_reviews.title: nice raclette...
customer_reviews.text: takes a little to get warm and the temp slider can be a bit sticky, but ones it's hot, it's great. Haven't tried the stone yet, but so far it's a great appliance
customer_reviews.author: FR

customer_reviews.title: Not as hot as some other brands
customer_reviews.text: Had two going for whole family Christmas Eve diner. Fun fun fun. It kept everyone at the table a long time.
customer_reviews.author: William H. Prindle

customer_reviews.title: Use chihuahua cheese if you don't have raclette
customer_reviews.text: Love this grill! If you can't find raclette cheese, buy a block of chihuahua cheese. I think that's what it's called. The white, Mexican cheese. It melts perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: BN H.

customer_reviews.title: Fam favorite
customer_reviews.text: We had a great dinner! We put veggies and seafood on and was impressed by the presentation of it all and taste.
customer_reviews.author: K.G

customer_reviews.title: Great raclette grill
customer_reviews.text: I love this raclette grill! We're able to host Raclette party as we used to do in France. Everybody loved it! It's very easy to clean. I highly recommend to anyone that enjoys entertaining and for the French people that are homesick. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Adeline CHAUTARD

customer_reviews.title: Never cooked the food
customer_reviews.text: After being on for over an hour, the food on the grill and the cheese in the plates never even heated up! Maybe I got a defective one but I had to return it. I’ve used other Raclette grills before so I know how they should work.
customer_reviews.author: Janay

customer_reviews.title: Try it !!!
customer_reviews.text: Have wanted one for a long time since I first saw one in Denmark where my daughter lives. I finally pulled the trigger and bought !! Had the most wonderful dinner ever!! Love love
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Van Zandt

customer_reviews.title: Fine product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good unit. V we have used it many times and it is a good product. No problems, quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Wigwheel

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use, easy to clean, we love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it and fun to use! We use it a lot in parties. Easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Ann Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed. It won’t heat up and we had to use our sandwich grill to heat up the vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: lita aragunde

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Low quality, cheese only melts well in the four center slots. Cheap product, cheap look, cheap performance. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Gonzalo S.

customer_reviews.title: Great concept
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Fun and interesting way to eat with friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: plastikarma

customer_reviews.title: Party fun and good for every day use too!
customer_reviews.text: We used this for NYE but it is so great for every day use. I love this grill!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Sample-Reif

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set! Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set! Works perfectly. Well packaged and does exactly as we expected. The upper grill did a nice job with our brats and the cheese literally slid off the little pans
customer_reviews.author: Eric in FL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Simply awesome and a great way to spend some quality time with kids
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift & I need to get replacement ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift & I need to get replacement; one of the burners does not work. Sincerely, F Sides @ DFLJPK@comcast.net
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product good packaging not.
customer_reviews.text: Product is great However the box it came in fell a part . I had to tape it together. Not great look for a gift
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Wojtowicz

customer_reviews.title: Easy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this with my Christmas money and we love it! The BEST for family dinners or having friends over! Easy to use and clean! Kids love it too!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert C Head

customer_reviews.title: I liked this grill and so far we are happy when ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked this grill and so far we are happy when we use it. It is handy and easy to clean. However the wood stick coming with it should be of a better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nabil Khoury

customer_reviews.title: Why buy it
customer_reviews.text: I dont like that the granite cookware spills over even with only three pieces of meat on it and the grill top is not easy to clean. The only thing I like is the flat top and raclettes perfect cheese smelters.
customer_reviews.author: Taffy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This raclette is sturdy, made well with quality materials. I made some toasted french bread with various cheeses etc. Came out beautifully. The granite top has some heft. Its a great buy and got here less than a week.
customer_reviews.author: PT6ADr

customer_reviews.title: just okay
customer_reviews.text: For the price point you can get a better one. Its just okay - not the greatest quality to cook food on and was expecting more accessories with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sladjana

customer_reviews.title: arrived all bent up
customer_reviews.text: The metal legs that hold up the grill were all bent out of shape when it arrived. The grill works well now, but i had to re-bend all the legs to stand back up before I could use it
customer_reviews.author: happy buyer

customer_reviews.title: Non-stock griddle peels off before use
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, we just opened our raclette as a Christmas gift and the inside corner of the non stick griddle was already peeling off when it came out of the box, before we even used it!!! It was fun using it, but I don’t think we will keep this if it’s already peeling before we used it.
customer_reviews.author: Esperanza

customer_reviews.title: Great for family fun
customer_reviews.text: What a great grill. Family has been enjoying it and getting creative with menu. Loved it so much, gifted it to 2 of my Bff's. Gets everyone to table and talking. Love raclette cheese too.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Isn't a non-stick surface
customer_reviews.text: non-stick surface isn't good for pancakes. Should have purchased a less expensive griddle
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Raclette parties are always a big hit. This one is of good.quality!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline W

customer_reviews.title: wonderful item
customer_reviews.text: I am having a problem melting the cheese. I love the great with neighbors.I will make it work
customer_reviews.author: William Lepere

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy and durable
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality and you can switch out the hot stone and the grill
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this!! We used it once so far, made shrimp..it was so delicious and quick to use and clean. I'm interested to see how other meats will do!
customer_reviews.author: Mhejazi

customer_reviews.title: Reunification
customer_reviews.text: What a great way to bring loved ones together .. No cell phones ! The four of us enjoyed cooking and eating . It was 3 hour experience .
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Rawlinson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is not very hot so it takes forever to melt your cheese
customer_reviews.author: Christophe Kubiak

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I can tell, because it's come with the stone top broken in three parts or more. The packing will be better to prevent it
customer_reviews.author: Carmen N. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a party of 6
customer_reviews.text: Nice and easy to use, we had a great time during Christmas for a raclette party with friends
customer_reviews.author: Sihem FEKIH

customer_reviews.title: takes awhile to heat the stone
customer_reviews.text: I takes awhile to heat the stone. and I used a foil tent to retain the heat I like it
customer_reviews.author: Dolores Ross

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grill was great, but the package arrived with a broken cutting board. It was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jackee m.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: If you like cheese then you need to get one of these Very practical and fun Perfect for winter cozy nights Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Don't loose money with more expensive raclette grills: this one has everything you need.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: A must have raclette
customer_reviews.text: A must have raclette! Easy to clean and great size! Fast and reliable shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Benbino

customer_reviews.title: the cheese sticks horribly to them
customer_reviews.text: The only downside about this is the mini scraping spatulas are unfinished wood. the cheese sticks horribly to them, plastic spatulas would have been much better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. If you love raclette(French style) you love this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great item for Raclette and Grill
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use. I like that it comes with a two grilling surfaces. Good value for your money
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Flury

customer_reviews.title: We are very disappointed by this product
customer_reviews.text: We are very disappointed by this product.. we tried it last weekend and it took more than 5 min to have a cheese barely melted.. so imagine how long was our dinner !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Love it, as will all of these, takes a while to warm up. But did a great job
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great conversation and good eats
customer_reviews.text: You want to have an interesting dinner party with friends, buy this Raclette, great conversation and good eats!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and intact. Works like a charm. We are really going to enjoy using this grill for family and entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The packaging could be better because when I opened the item it was slightly ...
customer_reviews.text: The packaging could be better because when I opened the item it was slightly damaged but overall works very well. The actual item is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Easily!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! My go to if I don’t want to use the oven
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product is great, excellent price/quality rapport. Prompt delivery, good service.
customer_reviews.author: Nataliya Z.

customer_reviews.title: We love how it works but when I did try to ...
customer_reviews.text: We just tried this grill. We love how it works but when I did try to hand wash it, it cut me for the edges are very sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Santana

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The grill is perfect but the performance is weak - you need a lot of time
customer_reviews.author: Stier Juerg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this Raclette. It comes with both stone and non-stick grill.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: MILLIARD RACLETTE
customer_reviews.text: Raclette ok, a little narrow surface, a bit hard to clean, cook ok - pleased with product. I give it 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Lemire

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Introduced this produce by our kids. Love it...especially since they love theirs, I'm surprised it is not in more stores.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa J. Rhoads

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Used the raclette grill yesterday for Easter. Easy to use, easy to clean. Everyone enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: John S. OSullivan

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t heat enough so the cheese doesn’t meld properly. It seems not enough power
customer_reviews.author: Lucia

customer_reviews.title: A great enjoyable product for a sit down dinner with friends and family
customer_reviews.text: This is a great enjoyable product for a sit down dinner with friends and family. Price maybe a little high, but, all the competition has a higher price. Carve your steak, chicken, pork about 1/2' thick cook as desired, cook your veg's, cheese etc below in the handy trays. Its only great. Don't forget this product can be used as a grill for pancakes, cheese sandwich, eggs, french toast all in one, plus you get QCD - Quality - Cost - Delivery!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: It worked great! The unit heated up much faster than I expected it to, it grilled our array of meats and veggies perfectly, and the melted cheese just slid right out of the little pans. I was a bit dubious when I felt how light the base was, but it far exceeded my expectations. I'm very glad I purchased this particular raclette grill and look forward to all the creative meals to come.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend to anyone who likes to cook healthy and share with others.
customer_reviews.text: This was even better than expected. Had used these in Europe, Now available in the U.S. Healthy way to cook. Also great way to provide variety for a crowd with the eight individual units that fit under the grill. Cooked and cleaned as advertised. Would recommend this to anyone who likes healthy cooking and sharing a meal.
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love this grill, and we use it all of the time!
customer_reviews.author: Margo Morton

customer_reviews.title: As long as the longevity is good I have no hesitation in recommending this
customer_reviews.text: As long as the longevity is good I have no hesitation in recommending this. We've used it twice and it's done a great job and is loads of fun. But beware those dieting...it's so much fun you need to be careful how much you're eating. That would be no fault of the grill however.
customer_reviews.author: PALA

customer_reviews.title: I will like
customer_reviews.text: I thought a recipe booklet came with! I will like one
customer_reviews.author: Yegni Carruyo

customer_reviews.title: Our family has learned to enjoy a "Raclette evening" with all ages participating
customer_reviews.text: Our family has learned to enjoy a "Raclette evening" with all ages participating! The size of this grill is great, as well as the various types of grills offered. The stone takes longer to heat up than anticipated and it didn't seem to heat/cook the vegetables as well. I wouldn't discourage a purchase, just make sure your menu has included pre-cooked vegetables and meats. It's lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Kay Scribner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grill, glad I ordered it.
customer_reviews.text: I like almost everything about my Raclette Grill, it's easy to use, cleans up nicely. I was unsure when I ordered, based on the photo, if the little cheese melt pans underneath could be accessed from the end instead of just the sides - a better photo to demonstrate that would have caused me to order much sooner instead of searching for a grill that guests could access from both ends as well as the sides. This can, I discovered when I received it. My only complaint, and it's minor, is the reversible grill is very lightweight. But it works great and cleans up nicely. I haven't tried the granite top yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Long

customer_reviews.title: Works well, its not a refined (stone) as the Swissmar but half the price
customer_reviews.text: Our first raclette is from Swissmar. We wanted a second one for guests and saw this one at half the price. It works as well as the Swissmar. The stone is less "refined" which means the grease grove is not smooth and has cutting marks. However it cleaned as easy as the Swissmar (which I guess is a premium product). I also prefer the heating slide, the Swissmar is very fragile and prone to breaking. At $65 u can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Greg P.

customer_reviews.title: Fun way to eat, but this is a bulky and heavy appliance.
customer_reviews.text: My three younger kids enjoyed eating like this, although I was really nervous they'd burn themselves. The chord was fairly short, so I had to use an extension. Between all the little pieces and the chords, it was hard to relax and enjoy. Also there is nothing to store the items in. The stone piece is quite heavy. So storing everything is a pain in the rear end. You've got heavy pieces and lots of little pieces and nothing to put it all in.
customer_reviews.author: J. deRosier

customer_reviews.title: Great Two Surface Raclette Grill
customer_reviews.text: After visiting family in Switzerland and enjoying several Raclette meals, I knew I had to have my own Raclette Grill. I looked at lots of grills and decided the Milliard Raclette Grill had everything I wanted. I espically like the two grill surface choices. The granite surface has a groove to keep grease or liquids contained. The reversible non-stick grilling surfaces has a flat griddle surface and a raised grill surface. Both have raised sides to keep all grease or liquids contained. I replaced the wooden spatulas with plastic non-stick ones.
customer_reviews.author: C.White

customer_reviews.title: Nice for family or any other events.
customer_reviews.text: I learned about this on Switzerland, therefore, I used the same concept, which is to share some times with friends or with Family (I used with my family), I used the Granite Cooking Stone and worked perfect. turn the stone 30 min. before start.
customer_reviews.author: A. Taveras

customer_reviews.title: Totally disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We bought this raclette grill for a birthday celebration, but it totally let us down - it stop heating during during the first usage :(
customer_reviews.author: mmvcst

customer_reviews.title: Shake up family dinner with this!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to try and break-up the monotony of our family dinners during COVID. I absolutely love this grill! We used deli meats to speed up the cook time. It says it's for 8 but it was barely big enough for 4 adults.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seriously so cool!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a fondue party and everyone loved it! We used it like a hibachi so everyone could cook their own steak, Shrimp and veggies. So much fun!!!! I will probably be picking up another one for my families white elephant Christmas party.
customer_reviews.author: Tori Detroit

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: So fun, works great. The stone and griddle are goodie quality and all the accessories are good quality. It would be nice if the power cord was extra long because to use it at the table requires an extension cord
customer_reviews.author: BandJzed

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fun
customer_reviews.text: We love it! Best raclette ever. Easy way to entertain and spend a good time with friends and family. It is easy to set up and clean afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Thacbs

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect set. I love this. I almost can't wait for the winter to come back to have raclette again. In the meantime, we'll use the griddle to cook at the table.
customer_reviews.author: wondermagott

customer_reviews.title: What an amazing gift!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift from my friend, after she had bought one herself. She told me how much fun it was, and what a great family meal it made. We had so much fun grilling chicken and steak, and roasted cheese on the potatoes in the lower rack. We hand washed all the components and it was easily cleaned and put away.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Olson

customer_reviews.title: Thank you so much my mom absolutely loved her birthday present and has used it several times ...
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much my mom absolutely loved her birthday present and has used it several times works amazingly thanks again
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Donley

customer_reviews.title: The coating does not last!!!!!! Do not recommended
customer_reviews.text: It peeled off right after the first use... I rinsed it with water and it came right off.... the coating is minimum
customer_reviews.author: texas

product_meta.title: Milliard Raclette Grill for Eight People, Includes Granite Cooking Stone, Reversible Non-Stick Grilling Surface, and 8 Paddles - Great for a Family Get Together or Party
feature_bullets: Make a new kind of cheese dish with our raclette grill. Cook up meats, veggies, seafood, and more with melted cheese – all in one unit!
Simple and portable social dining that lets everyone pick what they want from the grill and drizzle their cheese on top, or just dip their items in their cheese pan.

Non-stick surfaces allow for more sliding and easy cleanup. Reversible grill top has a flat side and a grilled side for getting just the right sear on your food. Granite stone grill top heats slowly and evenly for perfectly cooked fish, meat and veggies.

Adjustable grill temperature is ideal for versatile cooking options, and a visible indicator light makes sure you don’t forget to turn your grill off when you’re done. Grill top and coupelles are dishwasher safe.

Includes the raclette unit, granite stone top, reversible grill top and eight non stick cheese pans. Unit measures 18x9¼x5in with 18x9¼ inches of grilling surface. Input: 120V 60Hz 1200W / ETL Certified
